pullRequest.title: Manager bsc1168310
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?
Some minimal installations only have perl-base but not perl installed. Such systems cannot be bootstrapped as traditional clients when the OS media is not available because perl is not part of the bootstrap repos. Since suseRegisterInfo in fact only needs perl-base, relax the requirement.
GUI diff
No difference.

 DONE

Documentation


No documentation needed: internal


 DONE


Test coverage


No tests: Can only be triggered in very special scenarios


 DONE


Links
Fixes https://bugzilla.suse.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1168310

 DONE

Changelogs
If you don't need a changelog check, please mark this checkbox:

 No changelog needed

If you uncheck the checkbox after the PR is created, you will need to re-run changelog_test (see below)
Re-run a test
If you need to re-run a test, please mark the related checkbox, it will be unchecked automatically once it has re-run:

 Re-run test "changelog_test"
 Re-run test "backend_unittests_pgsql"
 Re-run test "java_lint_checkstyle"
 Re-run test "java_pgsql_tests"
 Re-run test "ruby_rubocop"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_oracle"
 Re-run test "schema_migration_test_pgsql"
 Re-run test "susemanager_unittests"
 Re-run test "javascript_lint"
 Re-run test "spacecmd_unittests"

commit.message: suseRegisterInfo only needs perl-base, not full perl (bsc#1168310)
suseRegisterInfo only needs perl-base, not full perl (bsc#1168310)

nodes.bodyText:
perl-base exists for SUSE only. RedHat does not have it. So we need to add some macros.
For SUSE, use perl-base. All other still just "perl"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -37,7 +37,7 @@ BuildRoot:      %{_tmppath}/%{name}-%{version}-build
 BuildArch:      noarch
 %endif
 Requires:       %{pythonX}-%{name} = %{version}-%{release}
-Requires:       perl
+Requires:       perl-base

commit.message: require perl-base on SUSE only, perl on other OSs
